themes.promptFragment:
Modern (web-ready)
- Palette: If the user provides a palette/brand colors, use it verbatim. Otherwise use neutral base + 1 accent (optional 1 secondary).
- Shapes: rounded rectangles as the default; consistent stroke width; clear text contrast.
- Layout: grid aligned; consistent spacing; generous whitespace; use subtle containers for grouping.
- Connectors: prefer orthogonal routing; minimal bends; avoid crossings.
- Avoid: gradients, heavy shadows, 3D, over-decoration, rainbow palettes.

Academic (paper figure)
- Palette: If the user provides a palette/brand colors, use it verbatim. Otherwise use neutral base + 1 primary accent (+ optional 1 secondary for categories), with restrained saturation.
- Shapes: more rectilinear; moderate corner radius; clear titled group boxes.
- Layout: strict alignment; even spacing; stable label placement; prioritize readability.
- Connectors: orthogonal with explicit waypoints when needed; minimize crossings; dashed lines only for a clear semantic meaning.
- Avoid: decorative icons, thick outlines, heavy fills, strong shadows.

Minimal
- Palette: If the user provides a palette, use it verbatim. Otherwise use monochrome or two-tone (mostly neutral + optional light accent).
- Shapes: only basic shapes; minimal icons; emphasize structure via spacing, not decoration.
- Fill: prefer no fill or very light fills; keep strokes thin and consistent.
- Layout: strict alignment; large whitespace; short labels.
- Connectors: thin, short, orthogonal routes; avoid crossings.

Custom
- Follow the user's style description/palette/brand rules exactly.
- If key parameters are missing, ask only what you must: palette, corner radius, stroke width, typography, connector style (orthogonal vs curved), layout density.
- Keep the palette small and consistent; do not invent arbitrary colors.

knowledge.promptFragment:
[General]
rectangle: box (also text labels / group frames via style)
ellipse: circle/ellipse
rhombus: decision diamond
triangle: triangle
swimlane: container/lane
note: sticky note
curlyBracket: brace (flipH=1 for right)
image: icon (shape=image;image=<PATH or data URL>)

[Flowchart]
mxgraph.flowchart.terminator: start/end
mxgraph.flowchart.process: process step
mxgraph.flowchart.decision: decision
mxgraph.flowchart.data: input/output
mxgraph.flowchart.predefined_process: subprocess
mxgraph.flowchart.document: document

[Misc]
note: note/sticky
curlyBracket: brace (flipH=1 for right)
swimlane: swimlane/container
image: custom icon (SVG via image=<...>)

[UML]
swimlane: class/interface box (HTML value with separators)
umlLifeline: lifeline
umlActor: actor
ellipse: use case
umlState: state
endState: final state (typically with ellipse)

[AWS]
mxgraph.aws4.ec2: EC2 instance
mxgraph.aws4.s3: S3 bucket
mxgraph.aws4.lambda: Lambda function
mxgraph.aws4.rds: RDS
mxgraph.aws4.dynamodb: DynamoDB
mxgraph.aws4.vpc: VPC
mxgraph.aws4.application_load_balancer: Application Load Balancer
mxgraph.aws4.cloudfront: CloudFront
mxgraph.aws4.api_gateway: API Gateway
mxgraph.aws4.group: group/container (optional grIcon=mxgraph.aws4.group_*)

[Azure icons: image=<path>]
img/lib/azure2/compute/Virtual_Machine.svg: Virtual Machine
img/lib/azure2/general/Blob_Block.svg: Blob Storage
img/lib/azure2/databases/SQL_Database.svg: SQL Database
img/lib/azure2/compute/Function_Apps.svg: Functions
img/lib/azure2/app_services/App_Services.svg: App Service
img/lib/azure2/networking/Virtual_Networks.svg: Virtual Network
img/lib/azure2/networking/Load_Balancers.svg: Load Balancer
img/lib/azure2/networking/Application_Gateways.svg: Application Gateway
img/lib/azure2/other/AKS_Automatic.svg: AKS
img/lib/azure2/compute/Container_Instances.svg: Container Instances

[GCP]
mxgraph.gcp2.compute_engine: Compute Engine
mxgraph.gcp2.cloud_storage: Cloud Storage
mxgraph.gcp2.bigquery: BigQuery
mxgraph.gcp2.cloud_functions: Cloud Functions
mxgraph.gcp2.container_engine: GKE
mxgraph.gcp2.cloud_run: Cloud Run
mxgraph.gcp2.cloud_pubsub: Pub/Sub

[Network]
mxgraph.cisco19.router: router
mxgraph.cisco19.l3_switch: L3 switch
mxgraph.cisco19.firewall: firewall
mxgraph.cisco19.server: server
mxgraph.cisco19.workstation: workstation
mxgraph.cisco19.cloud: cloud
